availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Residence: Lynn Camp, Knox County, KY. Kentucky-born son of Cornelius Gatliff Farris and Nancy Witt. First Lieutenant, Company F, KY 32nd Infantry Regiment. Enlisted November 2 1862. Mustered out July 6, 1863. Died.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Knox County, Lynn Camp District, p. 7.
Historical Data Systems, comp. U.S., Civil War Soldier Records and Profiles, 1861-1865 [database on-line]. Provo, UT, USA: Ancestry.com Operations Inc, 2009.
